page.title: 04ROLLESBY BROAD WEST FLEGG
page.content: The main attractions in Rollesby are the Broads.The Broads are on each side of the A149.On the Northen side of the road you can rent a rowing boat and go fishing on Ormesby Broad.On the southern side there is a yacht club.Rollesby Broad is also very beautiful and has some ducks living there.One Broad also bigger than the other.You can fish from a good spot by the Broad.There is also a large area of deciduous and coniferous trees surrounding the Broad. The farmland in Rollesby is mostly covered with Peas and Barley. The Water company is hidden behind some trees facing the road.There is a road going up to the water but you can't go up there because it is private.
